Name of Web Page: Solved: access-list remarks - Cisco Community
Web Page Snippet: First, execute show ip access-list from the exec mode and note the line numbering on the access-list entries. Second, enter in config mode and go into the access-list submode by typing ip access-list extended NAT. Third, when entering the command select a number that's between the line numbering from step 1.
